health_discussed_people_names: Kibwana Baya, Kibwana Swaleh, Kitula, Mwalimu, Mwaka Bakari, Bwire, Mwalimu Mgwisho, Nyiro, Thoya, Shebe Athman, Faith Mwende
health_data_challenges: The challenges of relocating persons under methadone prescription at Kisauni Dispensary and Frere Town due to overcrowding and the need to decongest the hospitals.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Relocation or creation of designated areas for methadone users in Likoni Sub-County, Shika Adabu Hospital, and Port Reitz; Suggestion to relocate methadone users to closed areas to prevent interactions with the community.
health_evidence_base: Reports, conversations, and statements provided by the Department of Health regarding the relocation of methadone users.
health_evidence_requested: No specific health information was requested.
